Pre-Game Insights: Dallas Mavericks (3-2, sixth in the Western Conference) face off against Orlando Magic (3-3, fourth in the Eastern Conference) in a cross-conference game.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game is scheduled for Sunday, 7:30 p.m. EST at Dallas.
Others: Injuries: Mavericks: Dante Exum out (wrist), Maxi Kleber day-to-day (hamstring). Magic: Paolo Banchero out (abdomen), Goga Bitadze day-to-day (foot).
